item.description: Gather to share your plans, hash out strategies, hear the latest buzz, and get connected over food and drinks with fellow activists for liberty. Stickers and signs will be available. We'll be there until at least 8 so no worries if you can't get there for 4. List of discussion topics tentatively includes: -Boston pub craw planning -Outreach to independents / anti-war community -August 11 Debate watching party -August 20 New Hampshire straw poll -August 20 Moneybomb Find us upstairs. Note we've also scheduled a similar meetup for the following Thursday, for those who can't make a weekend meetup. http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=167751996629934
item.name: Boston Ron Paul Weekend Meeting & Social
